seo.title: Pedro Guilherme - Developer, UI/UX & Business/SEO Strategist
seo.description: Boost your online presence with a multi-talented Web/Software developer, UI/UX designer who can provide top-notch Business/SEO improvements.

hero.title: Let's get your idea off the drawing board?
hero.subtitle: Bring your ideas to life with me! As a skilled professional, I'm here to help you create the perfect experience for your project. Let me take your idea off the drawing board and make it a reality.

about.title: How can I help with your project?
about.subtitle: See below some of the services I can offer to help boost your project.

cards.title: Web Developer
cards.description: I utilize the latest technologies and development methodologies to bring your ideas and designs to life in the form of dynamic and user-friendly web applications. I am committed to delivering high-quality results that exceed your expectations and drive real results for your business.

cards.title: UI/UX Designer
cards.description: I help bring user-centered design to life by creating interfaces that are both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional. I have a deep understanding of design principles, user research, and prototyping tools to ensure that your project is both visually appealing and user-friendly.

cards.title: Software developer
cards.description: I bring your ideas to life by building custom software applications that meet your unique needs. I have experience in multiple programming languages and development methodologies, and I can help you design, build, and launch a software product that exceeds your expectations.

cards.title: Business Strategies/Management
cards.description: Elevate your business to new heights with my strategic approach to management and planning. I can help you identify growth opportunities, streamline processes, and develop innovative solutions to drive success and achieve your business goals.

cards.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
cards.description: Take your online presence to the next level with my expert SEO strategies. I specialize in utilizing keyword research, content optimization, and link building to drive organic traffic and increase your visibility, helping you reach and connect with your target audience.

contact.title: Interested in working together?
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about your project or idea and find out how I can help you achieve your goals.

stats.title: Check out some of my stats.
stats.subtitle: Learn a little more about me with these stats.

feedbacks.title: My last feedbacks
feedbacks.subtitle: Check out some of the latest feedback on my work

items.name: Maria Silva
items.feedback: I hired Pedro for a UI/UX job for an e-commerce and he exceeded most of my expectations, he immersed himself in the project and understood exactly what we needed. I really liked the feedback he gives while working on the project, he really pays attention.

items.name: Diogo Silva
items.feedback: I hired you to make some improvements to an existing software in C++ and I was very impressed with your work. You were able to quickly understand the existing code and implement the necessary improvements without affecting the overall functioning of the software. In addition, the new user interface you created is much more intuitive and user-friendly, making the software more accessible for our users. I was very satisfied with your work and would recommend you to anyone looking for a skilled software developer.

items.name: Luiza Batista
items.feedback: I hired you to develop the front-end of an NFT website for my company and I was very pleased with your speed and proactivity in the job. You were able to deliver the front-end before the deadline and always made yourself available to clarify my doubts and make the necessary changes to meet my expectations.

contact.title: Get in touch with me
contact.subtitle: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question, a project idea or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
